Uses of Class
com.basho.riak.pbc.mapreduce.MapReduceBuilder

  • Packages that use MapReduceBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.basho.riak.pbc.mapreduce
    The legacy, low-level Protocol Buffers query classes for Map Reduce.
